body.p: To the Honorable Govenor of Kentucky or Chief Magistrate of the State

Where=as It appears from Record that there was a true bill found agnst John Brewer of the County of Franklin & State of Kentucky for selling or retailing Whiskey by the Small & after that a Judgement from the Circuit Court in Sd County for the Sum of thirty som dollars & then an execution was ishuned agnst Sd Brewer & G. D. Rucker entered as his Security and now the money is called for & Brewer has not got the money & we the under signed are personally acquainted with John Brewer & do Know him to be a hard working man & perfectly, honest in all of his dealings & we pray you to release Sd fine & Judgement agnst Sd. Brewer as we Know it will oppress him & his helpless family this the 1st day of march 1861

G. D. Rucker Security of Brewer
D. F. Bailey
J. S. Peyton
J N Mccann
Leonidas Rucker
Thomas Warren
Soloman Steel
J A Mobley
W,,H,, Rupe
J S Sheets
John Dees
Stephen Allen
G f hackett

Dennis Harp
Beverly Arnold
Dennis Onan

Franklin Cir. Ct
Remitted for 12 months
$37 } Liquer
Jno. Brewer
Issd Mar 15 1861
